properties.name: bremersee.ldaptive.search-validator.search-request.base-dn
properties.description: The ldap base dn of the pool entry validator.

properties.name: bremersee.ldaptive.search-validator.search-request.search-filter.filter
properties.description: The ldap filter of the pool entry validator.

properties.name: bremersee.ldaptive.search-validator.search-request.size-limit
properties.description: The size of the result list.

properties.name: bremersee.ldaptive.search-validator.search-request.search-scope
properties.description: The search scope of the validation query.

properties.name: bremersee.groupman.local-role
properties.description: If a role name is given, ldap will only be called, if the user has this role; if the role name is null or empty, ldap will always be called.

properties.name: bremersee.groupman.max-owned-groups
properties.description: The maximum number od owned groups.
